title: 2025june_lavender
description:
Lavender stands

Where cracked earth yields,
where dust takes flight,
through purple fields,
in golden light.

Where wind unravels names,
where silence sways like grass,
and musing claims,
shattered glass.

üíõ ü§ç üíú üñ§

Holiday pet created to celebrate June 2025!

though often unseen, in spaces between.

title: 2025nov_gsnail
description:
Glass shatters so easily,
dancing in rainbow colors,
light appearing like a kaleidoscope.

We're broken,
beautifully, like shards.

Holiday pet created to celebrate November 2025!

title: first real profile picture
description:
I got this persona roughly around 2015. My MAL account still uses it to this day, and I've made that in Feb 2017, so it's been a while!

Small disclaimer: This piece is *not mine*, I was super bad at drawing back then, as you'll see in other pieces.
This is fanart of Ao from Akatsuki no Yona, but I sadly can't find the original artist anymore.

title: 2nd
description:
Dinosaur? Glob? Neither me, nor anybody else really knows what this is. I created it while drunk or high and have since totally forgotten what it was meant to be.

It is also my first attempt at drawing my profile picture myself, and while it's obviously no artistic masterpiece, I still enjoy the picture hugely because of what I started back then.

Created circa 2019

description: I made this because I wanted people to submit their own blinkies onto Basement so I could feature them. This never quite worked out though and nobody submitted anything.

title: 2B in a box
description: You can see the original full scale of this in #pixelart. I really like the colors and everything, but this piece just breaks down once you look closer and notice how dirtily I worked.
